name: Vicky
description:
Vicky A chatbot roguelike designed for the WOWIE Jam 2022

Interact with Vicky, a childish, murderous AI gone rogue and intent on murdering the world.

Trailer Mechanics

Work to shut Vicky down by draining their battery through a series of mini games or by talking to them. Vicky can talk fairly organically, but they may occasional misunderstand you. The more you talk, the faster their battery drains.

Theme Tie-In (WOWIE 2022)

Vicky is very much about engaging with an AI and keeping it aggravated to save the world.

Warning!

While technically mobile compatible, this game has NOT been tested and most probably will break. It is recommended for computers.

Credits

Created by @rockwill with music by Bensound.com
